install.name: TemplatePlaza Menu
install.author: Jerry Wijaya TP Team
install.description: TemplatePlazza For J15 All in One Menu Sytem - Module for display custom menu (MooMenu, Suckerfish, Dropline, and Dropcolumn) Changelog in 2.0.1 - Fixing the itemid issue on dolphin and dropcolumn menu Changelog in 2.0.2 - Fixing menu hoverout animation Changelog in 2.0.3 - Fixing js syntax error issue in menu2.js.php and several minor issues - Changelog in 2.0.4 - Adding New Menu Decription Feature and fixing few minor issues
